attributes.action: allow deduction of the interest paid on mortgages from taxable income.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Simple really! The mortgage is paid from post-tax income, the interest paid is income for the banks - and the banks are [or should be] taxed on it. 

The people must be able to seek deduction on taxable income = the interest paid on a mortgage annually. Otherwise the same bit of money [our income] gets taxed twice!! 

Put money in peoples pockets by fair taxation - not ££ to banks to waste.
